narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Easter Seals New Hampshire, INC is a Home Health provider based in Manchester, NH. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $37.9M in Medicaid payments across 61K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $37.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
